item.Q:
Write the character:
the side; to incline towards; to lean; inclined; lateral; side
item.A:
侧 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 側
cè
侧重 (側重) cèzhòng place extra emphasis on

咬 (strokes unavailable)
yǎo
咬牙 yǎoyá to clench one's teeth; to grind the teeth; gnaw

item.Q:
Write the character:
China ink; ink stick; abbr. for Mexico
item.A:
墨 (strokes unavailable)
mò
石墨 shímò black lead; graphite; plumbago

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: smother; stuffy
2: melancholy
item.A:
traditional: 悶
1: mēn 2: mèn
苦闷 (苦悶) kǔmēn ademonia 沉闷 (沉悶) chénmèn (adj) (used in reference to weather) oppressive; heavy; (adj) depressed; not happy

qíng
晴天 qíngtiān clear sky; sunny day

item.A:
怖 (strokes unavailable)
bù
恐怖 kǒngbù terror

乔 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 喬
1: Qiáo 2: qiáo
乔治 (喬治) Qiáozhì George (name) 乔治 (喬治) Qiáozhì George (name)

齿 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 齒
chǐ
齿轮 (齒輪) chǐlūn (machine) gear; pinion (gear wheel)

岭 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 嶺
lǐng
山岭 (山嶺) shānlǐng (n) mountain ridge; spine of the mountains

tù

traditional: 側重
cèzhòng place extra emphasis on
zhòngcái arbitration

traditional: 姿勢

shímò black lead; graphite; plumbago

traditional: 照顧
zhàogu take (good) care of; show some consideration; to attend to; to look after

traditional: 醫療
yīliáo medical treatment
tōngxìn to communicate

traditional: 人民代表大會
rénmíndàibiǎodàhuì People's Congress

traditional: 會見
huìjiàn to meet with (sb who is paying a visit)

traditional: 詩人
shīrén bard; poet

traditional: 物價
wùjìa (commodity) prices

traditional: 民國
Mínguó Republic of China (1912-1949); used instead of reign name by the nationalist government, then by Taiwan; used in PRC as reign name of a former dynasty
bàolù expose; reveal; lay bare

traditional: 名義
míngyì titular; (do something) in sb's name

traditional: 放棄
fàngqì to renounce; to abandon; to give up

traditional: 長短
chángduǎn length; duration; accident; right and wrong; good and bad
cǎisè color; multi-colored
xiāngchà differ
